articles.title: New grasslands revelation could rewrite how humans evolved - The Indian Express
articles.description: A new study on grasslands in Africa and the evolution of apes could rewrite the story of human evolution.
articles.content: How apes transformed from grunting beasts to humans that would go on to build skyscrapers, aeroplanes and advanced computers is one of the greatest questions of science. Now, a new research study mig… [+3235 chars]

articles.title: Unitaid announces $31 million investment to prevent hepatitis C in marginalized groups | Africanews - Africanews English
articles.description: Global health initiative, Unitaid, is making a $31 million investment to prevent hepatitis C among people who inject drugs, and other at-risk populations.
articles.content:
Global health initiative, Unitaid, says it is making a $31 million investment to prevent hepatitis C among people who inject drugs, and other at-risk populations such as those in prison.
